subject: Pedal Inversion?
description_text:
Hello,

I've been enjoying my Pro X Ultras. I was wondering if there's a 3rd party pedal inversion kit that that would work with them or maybe you're developing something of your own? I'm using a Next Level Wheel Stand Lite 2.0.

Anyway, I'm in no rushing to add to my setup - but just a thought - for 2026.

Regards!

Konstantin

conversations.body_text: Hi Konstantin,     Thank you for reaching out — we’re really glad to hear that you’re enjoying your Pro X Ultra!  At the moment, we’re unable to provide further assistance regarding pedal inversion setups. We’ve noticed that some customers have successfully installed the pedals in an inverted position, but we haven’t conducted any official testing or development for such configurations yet.  Here is an image that I hope will be helpful to you.     Best regards, The Simsonn Team
